description:
Una Casita plans to use their airship Ikaros to spread the special abilities of the Shards of Tesla throughout the world via satellite. Botan, Kuruma, and Mickey sneak aboard the Ikaros to seize the Shards, as the final showdown with Una Casita begins.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: 「タイムリミット」についての考察
